description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1gn5n","text":"The 2023 NUS-Singapore iGEM Team followed this protocol to sequence their STAR oligo variants. The original protocol was released by Oxford Nanopore Technologies, but due to the use of a new type of flow cell in the experiment, some minor modifications to the steps were made to tailor it to our project.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a83lq","text":"Thaw Elution Buffer at room temperature and mix by vortexing. Then spin down and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b2a1d","text":"Thaw either Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) \u003e3kb or Short Fragment Buffer (SFB) \u003c3kb at room temperature and mix by vortexing. Then spin down and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gcf7","text":"In a 1.5 ml Eppendorf LoBind tube, mix in the following order:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9faej","text":"     Pooled barcoded sample      30μL        Native Adapter (NA)      5μL        NEBNext Quick Ligation Reaction Buffer(5X)      10μL        Quick T4 DNA Ligase      5μL   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":172}],"data":{}},{"key":"8od4q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["Item","Volume"],"colWidths":["326",120],"data":[["  Pooled barcoded sample  ","  30μL  "],["  Native Adapter (NA)  ","  5μL  "],["  NEBNext Quick Ligation Reaction Buffer(5X)  ","  10μL  "],["  Quick T4 DNA Ligase  ","  5μL  "]],"guid":"CF7452CAFEA6433FA3684A8D0879ECE8","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["  Pooled barcoded sample  ","  30μL  "],["  Native Adapter (NA)  ","  5μL  "],["  NEBNext Quick Ligation Reaction Buffer(5X)  ","  10μL  "],["  Quick T4 DNA Ligase  ","  5μL  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8avuo","text":"Ensure the reaction is thoroughly mixed by gently pipetting and spin down briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3aksg","text":"Incubate the reaction for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1e2do","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bdjgu","text":"Resuspend   by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"868k1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"4104497C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"AMPure XP Beads","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l1hq","text":"Add   of resuspended   to the reaction and mix by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"4104497C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"AMPure XP Beads","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dql18","text":"Incubate on a Hula mixer (rotator mixer) for   at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ennie","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on the magnetic rack. Keep the tube on the magnet and pipette off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"du65b","text":"Wash the beads by adding either   Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) or Short Fragment Buffer (SFB). Flick the beads to resuspend, spin down, then return the tube to the magnetic rack and allow the beads to pellet. Remove the supernatant using a pipette and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

Every  , agitate the sample by gently flicking for   to encourage DNA elution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qd8f","text":"Make up the library to   at 5-10 fmol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rsbq","text":"Thaw the Sequencing Buffer(SB), Library Beads(LIB), Flow Cell Tether(FCT) and one tube of Flow Cell Flush(FCF) at room temperature before mixing by vortexing. Then spin down and\nstore on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7a6od","text":"In a fresh 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube, mix   of Flow Cell Flush(FCF) with   of Flow Cell Tether(FCT) and mix by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"117","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lv8t","text":"Place the Flongle adaptor into the MinION or one of the five GridION positions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"30hba","text":"Place the flow cell into Flonge adapter, and press the flow cell down until hearing a click.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fi97b","text":"Peel back the seal tab from the Flongle flow cell, up to a point where the sample port is exposed. Lift up the seal tab, pull the seal tab to open access to the sample port, then hold the seal tab open by using adhesive on the tab to stick to the MinION Mk1B lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a29u","text":"To prime the flow cell with the mix of Flow Cell Flush(FSF) and Flow Cell Tether(FCT) that was prepared earlier, ensure that there is no air gap in the sample port or the pipette tip.\nPlace the P200 pipette tip inside the sample port and slowly dispense the priming fluid into the Flonge flow cell by slowly pipetting down. Recommend twisting the pipette plunger down to avoid flushing the flow cell too vigorously.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5u3at","text":"Vortex the vial of Library Beads(LIB). Immediately prepare the sequencing Mix in a fresh 1.5 ml        Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube for loading the Flongle as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpo4t","text":"     Sequencing Buffer(SB)      15μL        Library Beads(LIB) mixed immediately before use      10μL        DNA Library      5μL   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":132}],"data":{}},{"key":"5qknq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Item","Volume"],"colWidths":["372","178"],"data":[["  Sequencing Buffer(SB)  ","  15μL  "],["  Library Beads(LIB) mixed immediately before use  ","  10μL  "],["  DNA Library  ","  5μL  "]],"guid":"664C3EF413254A808EB07BCF63F538DB","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["  Sequencing Buffer(SB)  ","  15μL  "],["  Library Beads(LIB) mixed immediately before use  ","  10μL  "],["  DNA Library  ","  5μL  "]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5euma","text":"To add the sequencing mix to the flow cell, ensure that there is no air gap in the sample port or the\npipette tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o3c2","text":"Place the P200 tip inside the sample port and slowly dispense the sequencing mix into the flow cell by slowly pipetting down. Recommend twisting the pipette plunger down to avoid flushing the flow cell too vigorously.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4kbvq","text":"Seal the Flonge flow cell using the adhesive on the seal tab: stick the transparent adhesive tape to the sample port, replace the top(wheel icon section) of the seal tab to its original position.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bg9n5","text":"Replace the sequencing platform lid and start sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
